00017 static const int LOGICAL_COLUMN = 2;
00018 static const int PHYSICAL_COLUMN = 3;
00019 
00020 PortMapsDelegate::PortMapsDelegate(QObject *parent): 
00021 QStyledItemDelegate(parent) {
00022 }

00027 QWidget* PortMapsDelegate::createEditor( QWidget* parent, 
00028                                                                                 const QStyleOptionViewItem&,
00029                                                                                 const QModelIndex& index ) const {
00030         // if editing the port name
00031         if (index.column() == LOGICAL_COLUMN || index.column() == PHYSICAL_COLUMN) {
00032                 QLineEdit* editor = new QLineEdit(parent);
00033                 connect(editor, SIGNAL(editingFinished()),
00034                         this, SLOT(commitAndCloseEditor()));
00035                 return editor;
00036         }
00037         // if editing the boundary of a port
00038         else {
00039                 QLineEdit* editor = new QLineEdit(parent);
00040 
00041                 QRegExp regExp(QString("[0-9]*"), Qt::CaseInsensitive, QRegExp::W3CXmlSchema11);
00042                 QRegExpValidator* validator = new QRegExpValidator(regExp, editor);
00043                 editor->setValidator(validator);
00044 
00045                 connect(editor, SIGNAL(editingFinished()),
00046                         this, SLOT(commitAndCloseEditor()));
00047                 return editor;
00048         }
00049         
00050 }
00051 
00052 void PortMapsDelegate::setEditorData( QWidget* editor, 
00053                                                                          const QModelIndex& index ) const {
00054                                                                                 
00055         // if editing the port name
00056         if (index.column() == LOGICAL_COLUMN || index.column() == PHYSICAL_COLUMN) {
00057                 QLineEdit* lineEditor = qobject_cast<QLineEdit*>(editor);
00058                 QString text = index.model()->data(index, Qt::DisplayRole).toString();
00059                 lineEditor->setText(text);
00060         }
00061         // if editing the port boundary
00062         else {
00063                 QLineEdit* intEditor = qobject_cast<QLineEdit*>(editor);
00064                                 
00065                 QString value = index.model()->data(index, Qt::DisplayRole).toString();
00066                 intEditor->setText(value);
00067         }
00068 
00069 }
00070 
00071 void PortMapsDelegate::setModelData( QWidget* editor, 
00072                                                                         QAbstractItemModel* model,
00073                                                                         const QModelIndex& index ) const {
00074 
00075         // if editing the port name
00076         if (index.column() == LOGICAL_COLUMN || index.column() == PHYSICAL_COLUMN) {
00077                 QLineEdit* lineEditor = qobject_cast<QLineEdit*>(editor);
00078                 QString text = lineEditor->text();
00079                 model->setData(index, text, Qt::EditRole);
00080         }
00081         // if editing the physical port
00082         else {
00083                 QLineEdit* intEditor = qobject_cast<QLineEdit*>(editor);
00084                 QString value = intEditor->text();
00085                 model->setData(index, value, Qt::EditRole);
00086         }
00087 }
00088 
00089 void PortMapsDelegate::commitAndCloseEditor() {
00090 
00091         QLineEdit* lineEditor = qobject_cast<QLineEdit*>(sender());
00092 
00093         if (lineEditor) {
00094                 emit commitData(lineEditor);
00095                 emit closeEditor(lineEditor);
00096         }
00097 }
